thread.title: Please come look at this photo of Jay Z and Blue Ivy making the EXACT SAME FACE
thread.title_full: Please come look at this photo of Jay Z and Blue Ivy making the EXACT SAME FACE

author: Brittany Malooly
title: Please come look at this photo of Jay Z and Blue Ivy making the EXACT SAME FACE
text:
Please come look at this photo of Jay Z and Blue Ivy making the EXACT SAME FACE We love getting a look at the beautiful Carter family out and about together. So, it’s no surprise that we’re GUSHING over the latest photos of Bey, Jay, and Blue at an NBA All-Star game in New Orleans. We adore the pics of the Carters smiling , of course, but there’s one other slightly different shot that we have to share. It’s of Jay Z and little Blue making the SAME EXACT face while focusing on the game.
LOOK AT IT:
Kevin Mazur/Getty Images NO SERIOUSLY LOOK AT IT:
Kevin Mazur/Getty Images We can’t get enough of this photo. Seriously.
How cute is the fam at this game though ? They looked like they had so much fun:
It doesn't get much cuter than #BlueIvy having a blast courtside at the #NBAAllStar game with #JayZ and #Beyonce! Link in bio for all the pics (Photo credit: Kevin Mazur/Getty Images) 
A post shared by Us Weekly (@usweekly) on Feb 20, 2017 at 10:07am PST 
Blue Blue #beyonce#blueivy#jayz#carters#family#familytime#motheranddaughter#fatheranddaughter#pregnancy#slay#allstargame#neworleans#lousiana 
A post shared by Keeping Up With The Carters (@carter.kidz) on Feb 20, 2017 at 1:15pm PST 
#nbaallstar #beyoncéjayz #beyoncebaby #blueivy #BeyHive #queenbey #beyonce 
A post shared by BEYONCE TURKIYE (@beyoncceturkey) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:30pm PST 
And we LOVE this goofy pic. They’re even rocking similar facial expressions here, too!
#jayz #blueivy 
A post shared by Baller Alert (@balleralert) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:06pm PST 
Jay and Bey are notoriously private about their family life, but every once in a while Jay opens up. Jay talked about Blue back in 2013 in a Samsung commercial, saying, “It’s something that we both created, you know? We still marvel at her.” Aww.
Bey said in 2013 during an interview with Oprah Winfrey that starting a family has been her greatest accomplishment . “It’s so much joy and I have my best friend,” Beyonce said. “She is hilarious and she is fire. I didn’t expect her to be fire but lord I’m a have me a time. She’s beautiful.”
We’re so happy for the family that they are expecting two more adorable additions! If you haven’t heard, Bey is pregnant with twins ! She recently shared on Instagram the following:
We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. – The Carters We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters 
A post shared by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST 
We bet Blue will be an amazing big sister ! We love how close this family is!
